To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private OnNeck _onneck;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_onneck = OnNeck(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_onneck.IsReady)
{
    var current = _onneck.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.onneck = self.OnNeck(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.onneck.IsReady:
    current = self.onneck.Current.Value
